DrugName: Oxycodone (Immediate-Release Tablets) 5mg every 4 hours as needed
Gabapentin (Tablets) 100mg three times a day for neuropathic pain management
Cyclobenzaprine (Oral Tablets) 5mg four times a day for muscle spasms and pain
Baclofen (Tablets) 10mg every 6 hours for muscle spasm relief
Metoclopramide (Injection) 2.5 to 5mg administered intravenously every 15 minutes as needed for nausea and vomiting
